attributes.action: Help South Africa during this Civil War that has been started.
attributes.additional_details: We need to stop the suffering and violence that is happening and due to come! The rest of the world need to take a stand and stop this from continuing.
attributes.background: Support is needed urgently to stop the destruction and violence happening in South Africa. People have no food and water with children and babies suffering. People are sitting ducks waiting to be attacked or murdered. International intervention is imperative.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592030
